docna.cdata!:
Lebanon - Reconstruction Project : Loan 1476
            - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Lebanon - Reconstruction Project
            : Loan 1476 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

18196661.admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
In coordination with other external
            sources, the proposed loan would help finance (i) the
            rehabilitation of the port of Beirut, (ii) the
            rehabilitation of the telecommunication system, (iii) the
            most urgent rehabilitation needs in the water, sewerage and
            sanitation sector as well as a study program for its further
            reconstruction and development, and (iv) studies to prepare
            projects in critical areas of urban reconstruction and
            regional development (low-cost housing in Beirut, industrial
            estates and rural development in deprived regions of Lebanon
            and possibly the creation of a country-wide mass transit system).
